credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
title: Creamer
provenance: Purchase, 1982 (Christie, Manson, Woods Internation, Inc. New York, May 27 1982, lot 64); Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Globular body.  Triangular everted lip open at top. Raised square band encircles body at right angle to handle.  Tubular handle attached to body with walnut strut at top, and to shaped plinth that continues as base of teapot body.  En suite with 1982-21-1a,b; 2a,b; 3a,b.
name: Creamer
